title: T-Sampling Distribution
question_text: A study on women’s weights was recently completed. Twenty randomly selected high school females from an urban setting were compared to $21$ randomly selected females from a rural setting. A portion of the results are below: Two-Sample $T$ for Urban Weights vs. Rural Weights N Mean StDev SE Mean Urban Weights 20 126.1 10.5 2.35 Rural Weights 21 128.8 13.2 2.88 Describe the sampling distribution of the difference between urban and rural weights.

choices.text: Shape unable to be determined.   Mean = − 2.7 − 2.7 Standard deviation = 1.16 1.16
Shape unable to be determined.   Mean = − 2.7 − 2.7 Standard deviation = 3.72 3.72
